title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.10 - Unauthorized use or occupancy of operational area prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.10 - Unauthorized use or occupancy of operational area prohibited

State Regulations

No person shall use or occupy an operational area for
any purpose whatsoever except a purpose pertaining to the servicing of tenants, concessionaires, airlines, activities associated with airlines, or governmental
agencies, or a purpose connected with a maintenance and operation of an air
terminal. No person shall use or occupy an operational area for any purpose
whatsoever except maintenance and operation of air terminal. Persons so
authorized must carry and/or display personal identification of the type and in
the manner specified by the manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1260.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
